long_description: Not sure if you're expecting sunshine or showers for your hike? With a mesh crown and removable GORE-TEX(R) waterproof cover, the deluxe Outdoor Research Ghost Rain Hat keeps you prepared for both. Waterproof, breathable 2-layer GORE-TEX crown sheds water to keep you dry in a sudden shower; when not in use it packs up into a small hidden pocket in the back. Wide-brimmed hat uses lightweight, durable nylon fabric for the brim and raincover and polyester mesh for the ventilated crown. Polyester mesh ventilation promotes breathability and temperature control in warm weather. Adjustable interior band ensures a perfect fit; magnets secure side of brim to crown for a more streamlined look. Outdoor Research Ghost Rain Hat features a removable, adjustable chin cord to keep hat in place.
